message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering me for the product. After evaluating its value, I believe a fair price would be $12,000. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the value I place on this product is considerably higher.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
I understand your perspective, but based on my assessment, I am unable to meet at $13,500. My final offer remains at $12,000. I hope this proposal better aligns with your budget.
